title: Welcome to Exotic Matter

summary.description: Welcome to the inaugural episode of Exotic Matter, where we explore the evolving landscape of knowledge work and expertise.
summary.guest: João Landeiro is the host of Exotic Matter and founder of Mesozoic. This introductory episode sets the stage for conversations about productizing expertise and the future of knowledge work.

topics: What is Exotic Matter and why does it exist?
What kinds of conversations will we be having?
Who are the guests and what can you expect from them?
